name: RoadRunner Experiment B
description: With our previous iteration of RoadRunner, there was no obvious indicator or call-to-action to "kick off" the delivery journey once the route has been planned. Thus we planned an experiment with two options to start the journey: a "start navigation" bar at the top of the task list VS a floating action button at the bottom. After conducting our user experiments, the results and qualitative feedback we gathered resulted in our decision to combine both and use a fixed action bar at the bottom of the list.
